subject: No Longer
text:
I no longer wish to be,
In such a stupid society,
Give them science facts,
And those giving are cracks!

So little knowledge abounds,
That only ignorance surrounds,
The majority of closed minds,
Among races of all kinds!

Most minds that will not learn,
Of Charlatans that do not discern,
Between any sex or race,
To have their beliefs in place!
